name: 胡石政
objective: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
schedule:
1. Cleanroom history and application (3 hrs)
2. Design criteria of industrial and bio cleanrooms (2 hrs)
3. Ventilation theory for cleanroom(4 hrs)
4~5 VAC theory for cleanroom(6 hrs)
6~7 Facility system – nine sub-system(6 hrs)
8. Utility system – gas, water, power etc. (3 hrs)
9. Mid-term exam(3 hrs).
10. Airborne molecular contamination – influence, testing, and   solution(3 hrs)
11~12. Cleanroom testing, adjustment and balancing(6 hrs)
13~14. Cleanroom verification (6 hrs)
15~18 Final design project (12 hrs)
scorePolicy:
Mid Term 30%
Homework 30%
participation 10%
Final test 30%
